inputs.label: use_context
inputs.description: When true, include this run's active context messages (context.messages) in the LLM request. If the pin is not connected, the node checkbox is used. Default: false.

inputs.label: provider
inputs.description: LLM provider id (e.g. LMStudio). If unset, uses the node’s configured provider.

inputs.label: model
inputs.description: LLM model id/name. If unset, uses the node’s configured model.

inputs.label: temperature
inputs.description: Sampling temperature (0 = deterministic). If unset, uses the node’s configured temperature.

inputs.label: seed
inputs.description: Seed for deterministic sampling (-1 = random/unset). If unset, uses the node’s configured seed.

inputs.label: system
inputs.description: Optional system prompt for this single call.

inputs.label: prompt
inputs.description: User prompt/content for this single call.

inputs.label: tools
inputs.description: Allowlist of tools exposed to the model as ToolSpecs (model may request tool calls; execution is done via a Tool Calls node).

inputs.label: structured_output
inputs.description: Optional JSON Schema object (type=object) the assistant content must conform to.

outputs.label: response
outputs.description: Assistant text content (best-effort). For tool calls, content may be empty.

outputs.label: tool_calls
outputs.description: Normalized tool call requests (same as result.tool_calls). This pin exists to make wiring into Tool Calls / Emit Event nodes simpler.

outputs.label: result
outputs.description: Full normalized LLM result (content, tool_calls, usage, provider/model metadata, trace_id).

pinDefaults.prompt: write a 7 sentences scifi pitch idea
